verse:
1 Vindicate me, my God, and plead my cause against an unfaithful nation.
Rescue me from those who are deceitful and wicked. 2 You are God my stronghold. Why have you rejected me?
Why must I go about mourning, oppressed by the enemy? 3 Send me your light and your faithful care, let them lead me;
let them bring me to your holy mountain, to the place where you dwell. 4 Then I will go to the altar of God, to God, my joy and my delight.
I will praise you with the lyre, O God, my God.

5 Why, my soul, are you downcast? Why so disturbed within me?
Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise him, my Savior and my God.
